title: Large-Scale Collaborative Support Infrastructure Development for Enhanced Online Learning Accessibility

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Learners are lay citizens with advanced language domain expertise, exploring strategies to improve online learning accessibility via offline education using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more accessibility issues with online learning materials
Learners can apply an accessibility improvement checklist using collaborative support infrastructure with 80% accuracy
Learners can produce at least one piece of online learning content that can be verified for accessibility using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
